strapiInstantPayment.title: Payments
strapiInstantPayment.sub_title: Faster, easier and cheaper cross-border payments!
strapiInstantPayment.bank_transfers_description:
Send money easy, fast and securely!
Available in the US and soon to be live globally.
strapiInstantPayment.prepaid_cards_description: Ideal to offer as incentives, promotions, refunds, rebates and rewards.
strapiInstantPayment.recipients_description: Ideal for businesses who are ready to innovate, increase customer loyalty and offer an added value service.
strapiInstantPayment.partner_network_description:
Fund security and compliance
ensured every step of the way.

partner_network_slides.title: Faster payments
partner_network_slides.description: Extensive bank partnerships offer a significant reduction in payment times and enable near instant 24/7 payments

partner_network_slides.title: Don’t collect or store PII information
partner_network_slides.description: We eliminate the risk of you handling and storing banking details of those you pay

partner_network_slides.title: Up to 90% reduction in total fees
partner_network_slides.description: Replacing the old correspondent banking model ushers in flexible cost options

partner_network_slides.title: Bank-grade security
partner_network_slides.description: Transactions are safe, compliant and monitored every step of the way

strapiInstantPayment.bank_transfers_detailed_description:
Ideal for businesses making transfers
overseas, working on a global scale
strapiInstantPayment.prepaid_cards_detailed_description:
Virtual & Physical — Ideal to offer as incentives,
promotions, refunds, rebates and rewards

prepaid_cards_detailed_list.item: Instantly issued virtual Visa, Mastercard or UPI card
Possibility to brand cards with company logo
Issuance of physical cards in most countries
Availability for recipient to choose the card’s currency to hedge against weaker local currencies

strapiInstantPayment.recipients_detailed_description: Send directly to a mobile forward payment account with valuable and desirable options for the recipient.

recipients_detailed_list.item: Easy set-up with your payment as invitation link

benefits_list.title: Save/Hedge
benefits_list.description: Payees get the chance to invest money and start earning more straight away.

benefits_list.title: Transfer to bank
benefits_list.description: Payees also have the option to transfer the money to a bank account.

benefits_list.title: Prepaid card
benefits_list.description: The recipient can choose to receive payments to a prepaid card.

benefits_list.title: Save to ewallet or phone
benefits_list.description: Recipients can disburse money to their eWallet or phone.

benefits_list.title: Share with others
benefits_list.description: Payees can send money to a family member or friend.

benefits_list.title: Get cash
benefits_list.description: Payees have the option of instantly taking out the money at any ATM.

benefits_list.title: Transact & pay
benefits_list.description: Within the same account, recipients can get a virtual prepaid card and start using it to shop online.

benefits_list.title: Earn
benefits_list.description: With this option, payees can start earning 5% interest on funds in their GFA.

strapiInstantPayment.implementation_description: Seamlessly automate payments into your workflow

api_list.item: Easy to integrate into businesses' native applications
Possible to adapt to specific business needs
Offers recipients the possibility of choosing how to spend their funds

webapp_list.item: Ideal for small to mid-size businesses that prefer standalone tools
Businesses don’t have to pre-select “how” an individual is paid
Offers recipients the possibility of choosing how to spend their funds

frontmatter.name: Don’t collect or store PII information
Up to 90% reduction in total fees
